mapper.select: select ifnull(level,0) from sawon where sabun=#{sabun} and pwd=#{pwd}
select * from board where grp=#{grp} order by id desc limit #{index},10
mapper.insert: insert into board (sabun, title, content, grp, writeday) values (#{sabun}, #{title}, #{content}, #{grp}, now())
mapper.select: select ceil(count(*)/10) from board where grp=#{grp}
select * from sawon where sabun like concat(#{depart},'%')
select * from memo where reSabun=#{sabun} order by writeday desc limit #{index},#{pageSize}
select ceil(count(*)/#{pageSize}) from memo where reSabun=#{sabun}
select * from memo where seSabun=#{sabun} order by writeday desc limit #{seIndex},#{pageSize}
select ceil(count(*)/#{pageSize}) from memo where seSabun=#{sabun}
